mapper.insert: insert into CEO_store(sid, sname, location, phone, simage, weather, yearS, lvs, priceS, OpeningT ,restT, website, Ftype, RestD, info) values(#{sid},#{sname} ,#{location}, #{phone}, #{simage},#{weather},#{yearS}, #{lvs}, #{priceS},#{OpeningT}, #{restT},#{website},#{Ftype},#{RestD}, #{info});
mapper.select: select * from ceo_store order by sid DESC limit 0, 9
mapper.insert: insert into store_rating(uid, sid, retext, image, score, regidate) values(#{uid}, #{sid}, #{retext}, "", #{score}, now());
mapper.select: select favor from user_favor where sid = #{sid} and uid = #{uid};
